grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 舟運【シュウウン】transportation by water (e.g. by ship)
軽舟【ケイシュウ】light boat, skiff
同舟【ドウシュウ】shipmates, fellow passengers
kun reading compounds: 船【ふね】ship, boat, watercraft, vessel, steamship, tank, tub, vat, trough, counter for boat-shaped containers (e.g. of sashimi)
船貝【ふねがい】Arca avellana (species of ark shell)
曳船【えいせん】tugboat, towing, towage
